positive_examples: This is an example of bonded atom.
The bonded atom demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed bonded atom in this context.
A typical case of bonded atom would involve these features.
The concept of bonded atom applies here.
An atom that is chemically bonded to one or more other atoms through covalent, ionic, or metallic bonds.
negative_examples: This is an example of free atom, not bonded atom.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: FreeAtom, or other types of Atom

definition: An atom chemically connected to other atoms through sharing or transfer of electrons.
